pageContext.claim: “The Republicans are 5-0 in recent Congressional races, a point which the Fake News Media continuously fails to mention. I backed and campaigned for all of the winners. They give me credit for one. Hopefully, Rick Saccone will be another big win on Tuesday.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is selectively editing the GOP's record. Republicans did hold on to five House seats in special elections in 2017. But Democrat Doug Jones defeated Republican Roy Moore in Alabama's special election for the Senate seat vacated by Attorney General Jeff Sessions. Democrats also held onto a House seat in California vacated by Xavier Becerra's appointment to California attorney general.
